description: A school comedy with violent and blue jokes. Fujiwara Megumi is a beautiful high school girl but has a selfish and violent character. She has a boyfriend named Matsumoto Masamune, but she often goes around with other boys, who end up as victims due to her selfish behavior.

tags.name: Shoujo
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

alternative: マドモアゼルゆみこ先生

node.description: Haruhiko Suzuki is a magazine editor.
Shouji Hata is an Audio Engineer.
Mamiya Tomishige is the chief editor of shoujo magazine Ribon.
Yuuto Onofusa is a editor from Shueisha.

[Official Website](http://www.ladyspade.com/slf.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/SLF_SPD) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/slfspd/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/SLFSPADE)

SLF!! aka Shit Lives Forever is a Japanese DJ, MC, songwriter and composer. He is a member of the independent musician group [Sono Na wa Spade](https://anilist.co/staff/232897/).
